Package com.versant.var.common

Interface Summary
VARIAdmin This remote interface is used by the site admin to monitor status info of the repserver processes and modules via RMI.
VARIStopper This interface is used by VARAdminImpl to stop a module.
 

Class Summary
ChannelData  
VARAdminHelper This class is useful for accessing the runtime status information of the various replication server modules.
VARAdminImpl This is an implementation of the remote interface VARIAdmin used by the site admin to monitor status info of the repserver processes and modules via RMI.
VARChannel The replication channel
A wrapper class for the persistent replication channel.
VARConfiguration Represents the configuration - basically a repository of all configurable parameters.
VARCounter The counter for keeping track of allocated serial number for various objects.
VAREqualTo  
VAREvent This class implements a simple lock which can locked by one thread and unlocked by another.
VARGlobals This class keeps references to all the global objects.
VARHashSet Workaround for problems with COM.objectspace.jgl.HashSet especially with intersection()
VARLock This class implements a simple lock which can locked by one thread and unlocked by another.
VARLog Logger.
VARLogHelper This is a helper class to be used for logging.
VARMRSWLock  
VARSite The replication site
Represents a replication site object.
VARStatus The status of a repserver module/process.
VARStopper This class is repsonsible for stopping the main thread in a each of the replication server processes.
VARUtility Class to hold all the utility methods
 

Exception Summary
VARAPIException Represents exception : Extends VARException
VARException Represents exception
